info_welcome:
Uyemukelwa

Le mephu yadalelwa izinhloso ezimbili eziyinhloko (isacwaninga):

  • Imininingwane yabathengi yokuthi uvivinyelwa kuphi i-COVID-19(imvamisa ngemuva kwekholi yokuhlola)
  • Nikeza ithuluzi lokuhlela ezinye izindawo zokuhlola / izakhiwo
info_para1: Uyacelwa ukuthi wazi ukuthi imininingwane eminingi lapha itholakala ngumbhali noma i-crowdourcedced. Asikuqinisekisi noma yikuphi ukunemba.
info_para2: Yonke imininingwane ekuleli khasi, kufaka nomthombo wekhasi ingumthombo ovulekile. Ungathola lonke ulwazi ku-le GitHub repository.
info_para3: SITHANDA UKUBONGA kakhulu kubo bonke abanikele kule projekthi ngokunikeza amakhodi noma izindawo zokuhlola zabantu abaningi!
info_para4: Uma ufuna ukufaka isandla, sicela uzizwe ukhululekile ukungena ezindaweni zokuhlola ku Google Form noma ngokuthumela isicelo sokudonsa.
